title: [Large-scale] Reality-based Mathematics Education for Solving Differential Equation Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Understanding of First-Order Differential Equations, Basic Concepts of Linear Algebra, Experience in Mathematical Modeling
context.additional_context: Workplace-oriented education emphasizing real-life case studies to improve job applicability for employees.

learning_goals: Learners can identify systems of differential equations and convert them into mathematical models in real-world problem contexts
Learners can derive solutions to second-order linear differential equation systems using matrix techniques and graphical interpretation
Learners can select problem-solving strategies by comparing analytical expressions and numerical approximation methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
